content:
Project: Dawn Ridge Homes

Legend contains 56 abbreviations and symbols.

Project: Dawn Ridge Homes

General Notes:

- ALL BEARINGS REFERENCED TO GRID NORTH (Page 2)
- ALL DISTANCES SHOWN ARE GRID (Page 2)
- THIS SURVEY WAS PREPARED WITHOUT THE BENEFIT OF A TITLE COMMITMENT (Page 2)
- THIS SURVEY IS SUBJECT TO ANY AND ALL EASEMENTS AND/OR RIGHTS-OF-WAY OF RECORD (Page 2)
- VERIFY PIPE CROSSINGS, COVER, ALIGNMENT, STORM SEWER SIZE, MATERIAL, AND INVERTS PRIOR TO CONSTRUCTION. (Page 6)
- ALL STORM DRAINS ARE LOCATED AT CENTER OF EASEMENTS UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED. (Page 7)
- ALL PIPE GRADES SHOWN ON STORM STRUCTURES ARE AT THE CENTER OF THE STRUCTURE UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED. (Page 7)
- PROPERTY LINE (Page 8)
- STATION NUMBERS (Page 8)
- SHEET INDEX: COVER, NOTES, PLAN, PROFILE, STORM SEWER, SANITARY SEWER, WATER, EROSION CONTROL, GRADING, PAVING, DETAILS (Page 9)
